alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Susquehanna and east central Bradford Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Le Raysville, or 11 miles north of Wyalusing, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rush, Montrose, Dimock, Le Raysville, Friendsville, Rushville, Herrickville, Brushville, South Montrose and Elk Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania.
